title: Ranchitas Ceviche Style
ingredients: 1 pack Ranchitas Nacho Excitante (or the flavor of your choice).
instructions: Step 1. Cut the fillet into cubes.
Step 2. Place the fish in a bowl, add lime juice and orange juice, and season with pepper.
Step 3. Let rest for at least 8 hours in the refrigerator.
Step 4. Add ½ cup onion and ½ cup red bell pepper inside the Ranchitas package.
Step 6. Add the fish cubes and finely chopped cilantro to the package.
Step 7. Serve with lime to taste.
